name: Jaunty Marble
description:
Action Adventure

Jump and slide over slopes and moving platforms, dodge the fireballs 🔥🔥and evil spikes⚡⚡!! Not enough? There is much more in Jaunty Marble.

This is a side scrolling platform arcade game where you play as a marble and collect stars to win. Along the path solve the puzzles and explore interesting physics tricks. Kick the paint buckets and line up the wood boxes to cross over. 

An Adventures Game
Jaunty Marble, is a 2D side scroller game, in which you control a glass Marble. 
Unlike other usual platformer games, Jaunty Marble is based on physics based mechanics which makes it very challenging and exciting to play. The snowy❄⛄ and ice-cold level brings back the memories of classics like the ice climbers. 
The challenge is to become good at controlling the physics of game object to roll over and hyper jump. 

Game Features
• Platforming Actions: Jumping over the slides and slopes
• Collect stars to cross the level
• Balance Jumping, Rolling
• Three Quality Levels including Indoor, Wild night with Fireballs and Snow with Diamonds.
• Simple touch controls
• Catchy Sound tracks and Effects
• English Language Support
